# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/chance`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for Chance (http://chancejs.com).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/chance.

 * Dependencies: none
 * Global values: none
